Class RegistrationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.discovery.registration.RegistrationConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Toggleable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsulConfiguration.ConsulRegistrationConfiguration, EurekaConfiguration.EurekaRegistrationConfiguration

    public abstract class RegistrationConfiguration
extends Object
implements Toggleable
